org.pepstock.charba.client.data

Class StackedBarDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.Dataset
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.HovingFlexDataset
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.BarDataset
            • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.StackedBarDataset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasDataPoints, HasDataset

    public class StackedBarDataset
extends BarDataset
    The stacked bar area chart allows a number of properties to be specified for each dataset. These are used to set display properties for a specific dataset.
    Extends the bar dataset setting stack property.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
